item.title: CVE-2024-20041|2024-04-01T02:34:57.329Z -- MediaTek, Inc. -- MT2713, MT6781, MT6789, MT6835, MT6855, MT6879, MT6886, MT6895, MT6983, MT6985, MT6989, MT8188, MT8673, MT8676, MT8781
item.description: In da, there is a possible out of bounds read due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local information disclosure with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS08541746; Issue ID: ALPS08541746.
